seller_description: The PZOTRUF Automatic Soap Dispenser combines functionality and style to elevate your hygiene routine. Featuring a built-in infrared sensor, it delivers accurate, touchless soap dispensing within a 0-2.36 inch range, ensuring a hygienic, hands-free experience while minimizing messy drips with its no-drip spout. With a large 17oz (500ml) capacity and transparent container, it reduces the need for frequent refills and allows easy monitoring of soap levels. The dispenser offers 5 adjustable output levels for personalized usage and is crafted from high-quality brushed aluminum with IPX4 waterproof and leak-proof technology for durability and ease of cleaning. Powered by 4 AA batteries (not included), it’s versatile for use in homes, hotels, offices, and schools. Backed by a 2-year quality assurance and lifetime professional service, this sleek, reliable soap dispenser delivers both convenience and peace of mind.
review: Set this up in the guest bathroom, and it's been working exactly as it should. The metallic finish gives it a nice upscale look, and setup was as simple as popping in four AA batteries. Decent soap capacity means you're not constantly refilling it.Quick heads up that might save someone else some trial and error - while it works great with regular liquid soap, it's not designed for foaming soap. Tried it just to see, and yeah, it just dispenses it as liquid. Not a knock against the product, just good to know what it's meant for.The touchless feature works reliably - no awkward waving your hands around trying to trigger it. Perfect for a guest bath where you want something that looks nice but is also practical and hygienic.Something I share in all my reviews - I rate products on a simple idea - what am I getting for my money? That's why this gets 5 stars. Not because it's the fanciest soap dispenser out there, but because it delivers exactly what I needed at a price that makes sense.Bottom line: Solid automatic dispenser if you're using regular liquid soap. Looks good, works consistently, and makes hand washing a bit more convenient for everyone.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
Expected_output: The seller's description of the PZOTRUF Automatic Soap Dispenser highlights its touchless functionality, stylish metallic finish, and practical design features, including a generous 17oz capacity, 5 adjustable output levels, and IPX4 waterproof construction. The buyer's review aligns well with this, noting the product's reliability, sleek design, and effective performance for regular liquid soap. The buyer also appreciated its ease of use and hygienic benefits, while mentioning that it is not compatible with foaming soap, which matches the product's intended use as per the seller's details. The images provided by the seller and buyer are consistent, showcasing the metallic finish and overall design, confirming product authenticity. No discrepancies were noted between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience, leading to a satisfied buyer. Here, no fault lies with the seller, as the product meets its described functionality and quality.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
